name: Phobos Subhuman Demo
description:
The Demo demonstrates one of the areas and core mechanics of the game as well as part of the plot

2026...

During the first manned mission to Mars, a group of Astronauts visit the small moon of Phobos, one of the two Martian Satellites, where they mysteriously disappear without a trace. No one has any indication of what happened, except the all-powerful A.I. named G.O.D. (Growth Operations Defence), keeper of all the missions data.

2047...

In a very different, brutal, post-war world, plagued by famines, global warming, radioactivity as well as social discrimination, the daughter of one of the missing Astronauts is called to solve the mystery and uncover truths that will shake the foundations of modern social structures...

DANAE

Εmmanuels daughter.

Born and raised in an organized city but after her father's death she is forced to live in the slums out of the city walls

EMMANUEL

(University Professor Anthropologist – Astronomer)

  • Highly realistic 3D environments and characters
  • Immersive, tense, and mysterious atmosphere
  • Brutal hand to hand, melee, and ranged combat system
  • Unique plot based on astronomical and historical indications
  • Variety of both post-apocalyptic as well as Sci-Fi sceneries

Will you dare to challenge powers beyond your skill and your comprehension?
